thread.section_title: Club Quarters Hotel, opposite Rockefeller Center - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Not recommended for those seeking comfort
thread.title_full: Not recommended for those seeking comfort - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, opposite Rockefeller Center, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Quyen D
title: Not recommended for those seeking comfort
text: This may be okay for travelers on a budget, but I hope to avoid this hotel in the future. No bathtub, just a shower. The rooms are small and so are the beds. They forgot to service my room one day. Not a great experience here.
